articles.title: Lionel Messi has telling reaction to Barcelona failure vs Eibar following exit comments - Mirror Online
articles.description: Lionel Messi didn’t hide his frustrations after Barcelona dropped points against Eibar at the Nou Camp just days after he confirmed he would consider leaving at the end of the season
articles.content:
Lionel Messi didnt hide his disappointment as Barcelona were held to a 1-1 draw by Eibar on Tuesday night.
The Argentine was unavailable for the game and was left out of the matchday squad, but that… [+1794 chars]
